mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO taskFamilyPk (selfFamilyLevel,competitorFamilyLevel,selfFamilyId,competitorFamilyId,daystamp) select b.familyType as selfFamilyLevel,c.familyType competitorFamilyLevel,a.* from (select selfFamilyId,competitorFamilyId,#{daystamp} as daystamp from familyRelation where daystamp=#{daystamp}) a left join familyInfo b on a.selfFamilyId=b.id left join familyInfo c on a.competitorFamilyId=c.id
mapper.select: SELECT * from familyDriveDayStat where familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
SELECT * from familyDriveDayStat where daystamp=#{daystamp} and familyFlag=0
mapper.update: update familyDriveDayStat a, familyScore b set a.trophy=10,b.trophy=10 where a.familyId=b.familyId and a.daystamp=#{daystamp} and a.familyFlag=0 and b.startDay=#{startDay} and b.endDay=#{endDay}
UPDATE taskFamilyPk SET taskStatus=-1,taskFlag=#{taskFlag},taskDealTime=now() WHERE taskStatus = 0 and taskFlag='0' and daystamp=#{daystamp} LIMIT 500
mapper.select: SELECT * from taskFamilyPk where taskStatus=-1 and taskFlag=#{taskFlag}
mapper.update: UPDATE taskFamilyPk SET taskStatus=0,taskFlag='0',failTimes=failTimes+1 WHERE taskStatus=-1 and taskFlag<${compareTimes}
